description: Collects recent Windows Security and Defender events, with optional Sysmon, over a configurable lookback window. Emits NDJSON with verification, per-event entries, and a run summary. Defaults: HoursBack = 24, IncludeSysmon = false.

script_parameters.name: HoursBack
script_parameters.description: Number of hours to look back when collecting events. Default is 24.

script_parameters.name: IncludeSysmon
script_parameters.description: Include Sysmon channel if available (set to true/1 to enable). Default is false.
